duties: Demonstrated strong leadership skills in inventory management, overseeing receiving, counting, and returning tasks, and ensuring accurate inventory data in the system
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, fostering seamless operations, effective communication, and delivering high-quality customer service.
